long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension styles your new tab page in Chrome to show a beautiful background, the current time, and a dynamic greeting. Images are loaded randomly from the Unsplash images website, www.Unsplash.com, and the clock is continuously updated.
